com.jogamp.opengl.util.glsl.fixedfunc

Enum ShaderSelectionMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ShaderSelectionMode>
      • com.jogamp.opengl.util.glsl.fixedfunc.ShaderSelectionMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ShaderSelectionMode>

    public enum ShaderSelectionMode
extends Enum<ShaderSelectionMode>
    Shader selection mode
    See Also:
    AUTO, COLOR, COLOR_LIGHT_PER_VERTEX, ShaderSelectionMode#COLOR_TEXTURE, ShaderSelectionMode#COLOR_TEXTURE_LIGHT_PER_VERTEX

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      AUTO
      Auto shader selection, based upon FFP states.
      COLOR
      Fixed shader selection: Simple color.
      COLOR_LIGHT_PER_VERTEX
      Fixed shader selection: Color with vertex-lighting.
      COLOR_TEXTURE2
      Fixed shader selection: Multi-Textured color.
      COLOR_TEXTURE4
      Fixed shader selection: Multi-Textured color.
      COLOR_TEXTURE8
      Fixed shader selection: Multi-Textured color.
      COLOR_TEXTURE8_LIGHT_PER_VERTEX
      Fixed shader selection: Multi-Textured color with vertex-lighting.
